name: Andy
greetingText: I feel really cheerful when calling your name btw!
wishText: May this love and happiness always be with you! :)
textInChatBox: I Wanna say I love u three thousands!! Meow meow meow meow meow.
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text3: But I think it's far from enough.
replayText: Tap the screen, if you want to watch it again.
